resources.string: Enter the coefficients and Quadratic Equation will output the solutions (if they are not imaginary).
If A=0, the equation is not quadratic.
Please enter value for coefficient A. If A=0, the equation is not quadratic!!
There are two solution because the discriminant is greater than Zero
There is only one solution because the discriminant is equal to Zero
There is no real solution becasue the discriminant is less than Zero. Complex(imaginary)roots!!
Please enter value for coefficient A, B and C
